title: Heartburn
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Immediately drink a large glass of water. This will help wash the HCl back down and
dilute it as well.
• Drink some raw potato juice. Whiz up an unpeeled potato and drink it down.
• Do not lie down. Remain upright, so gravity can help push the HCl down and keep it
down. Later, when you do lie down, elevate the bed at the head by 4 inches.
• Avoid bending over; if you must lift something, bend at the knees. You do not want to
compress your stomach when you have heartburn.
• Eating mints relaxes the lower esophageal sphincter, so HCl can crowd up into the
esophagus.
• Do not drink anything caffeinated, for it will irritate the esophagus even more. Caffeine
relaxes the sphincter, so stomach contents can move on up. Tobacco smoke also relaxes
the sphincter. Estrogens relax it also.
• Drinking milk may feel good going down, but it encourages the stomach to secrete more
acid.
• Drinks with fizz in them expand the stomach and make it more likely that HCl will come
up the food pipe.
• Greasy, fried, and fatty foods sit in the stomach for a long time and increase HCl
production. Avoid meat and dairy products.
• Antidepressants and sedatives aggravate heartburn. Aspirin and ibuprofen cause
heartburn.
• Antacids only mask the symptoms. They also contain aluminum.
• Avoid stress, for that increases HCl production also.
• Loosen your belt; better yet, wear suspenders.
• Do not eat within 2½ hours before bedtime. Doing so not only can cause heartburn, but
bring on heart attacks also.
• Eat more raw vegetables, chew your food well, and eat slowly.
• Angina and heart attack are both very dangerous conditions (which see). Among the
earliest symptoms is, what appears to be, an "acid stomach." Beware. You are wise to eat
so that you do not have heartburn. Then if major heart trouble sends a warning message
that seems like heartburn, you will be less likely to sit back and take some aluminum,
from the drugstore, for "antacid." Aluminum is a cause of Alzheimer's disease (which
see).
(Acidosis, Overacid Stomach)
SYMPTOMS—A burning sensation in the stomach or chest.
CAUSES—Heartburn is a sense of burning in the stomach. In most instances, some of the stomach
digestive juices have backed up out of the stomach into the esophagus (the food tube between the mouth
and the stomach). This backing-up action is called reflux. These juices include hydrochloric acid, which
is a rather powerful acid. It is used in industry, to clean metal. When it comes in contact with the
esophagus, it burns the wall. Normally, the esophageal sphincter muscle shuts and prevents stomach
acids from pushing upward.
Heartburn can be caused by excessive consumption of fatty or fried foods, alcohol, coffee, spicy foods,
chocolate, or just having too much food in the stomach. Citrus fruits or tomato-based foods cause it in a
few people.
Other contributing factors are hiatal hernia, allergies, stress, gallbladder problems, and enzyme
deficiencies.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mara moja kunywa glasi kubwa ya maji. Hii itasaidia kuosha HCl nyuma na
Iongee pia.
• Kunywa juisi ya viazi mbichi. Whiz juu ya viazi visivyosababishwa na kunywa chini.
• Usilale chini. Kubaki wima, kwa hivyo mvuto unaweza kusaidia kushinikiza HCl chini na kuitunza
chini. Baadaye, unapolala chini, kuinua kitanda kichwani kwa inchi 4.
• Epuka kuinama zaidi; Ikiwa lazima uinue kitu, piga magoti. Hautaki
Shinikiza tumbo lako wakati una mapigo ya moyo.
• Kula mints hupumzika sphincter ya chini ya esophageal, kwa hivyo HCl inaweza kusonga mbele kwenye
esophagus.
• Usinywe chochote kilichochorwa, kwa kuwa itawakasirisha umio zaidi. Kafeini
Inapumzika sphincter, kwa hivyo yaliyomo kwenye tumbo yanaweza kuendelea juu. Moshi wa tumbaku pia hupumzika
Sphincter. Estrojeni kupumzika pia.
• Kunywa maziwa kunaweza kujisikia vizuri kwenda chini, lakini inahimiza tumbo kuficha zaidi
asidi.
• Vinywaji na fizz ndani yao hupanua tumbo na kuifanya uwezekano mkubwa kwamba HCL itakuja
juu bomba la chakula.
• Chakula cha grisi, kukaanga, na mafuta hukaa tumboni kwa muda mrefu na kuongeza HCl
Utendaji. Epuka nyama na bidhaa za maziwa.
• Dawa za kukandamiza na sedatives huzidisha mapigo ya moyo. Aspirin na ibuprofen husababisha
mapigo ya moyo.
• Antacids hufunga tu dalili. Pia zina aluminium.
• Epuka mafadhaiko, kwa sababu hiyo huongeza uzalishaji wa HCl pia.
• Fungua ukanda wako; Bora zaidi, Vaa kusimamishwa.
• Usila ndani ya masaa 2½ kabla ya kulala. Kufanya hivyo sio tu kunaweza kusababisha mapigo ya moyo, lakini
Kuleta mapigo ya moyo pia.
• Kula mboga mbichi zaidi, kutafuna chakula chako vizuri, na kula polepole.
• Angina na mshtuko wa moyo wote ni hali hatari sana (ambayo huona). Kati ya
Dalili za mapema ni, kinachoonekana kuwa, "tumbo la asidi." Jihadharini. Wewe ni busara kula
ili usiwe na mapigo ya moyo. Basi ikiwa shida kubwa ya moyo hutuma ujumbe wa onyo
Hiyo inaonekana kama mapigo ya moyo, utakuwa chini ya uwezekano wa kukaa nyuma na kuchukua aluminium,
Kutoka kwa duka la dawa, kwa "Antacid." Aluminium ni sababu ya ugonjwa wa Alzheimer's (ambayo
tazama).
(Acidosis, tumbo la kupita kiasi)
Dalili -hisia za kuchoma tumboni au kifua.
Sababu -Heartburn ni hisia ya kuchoma tumboni. Katika hali nyingi, tumbo zingine
Juisi za kumengenya zimehifadhiwa nje ya tumbo ndani ya esophagus (bomba la chakula kati ya mdomo
na tumbo). Kitendo hiki cha kuunga mkono kinaitwa Reflux. Juisi hizi ni pamoja na asidi ya hydrochloric, ambayo
ni asidi yenye nguvu. Inatumika katika tasnia, kusafisha chuma. Linapokuja kuwasiliana na
Esophagus, inachoma ukuta. Kawaida, misuli ya esophageal sphincter hufunga na kuzuia tumbo
Asidi kutoka kusukuma juu.
Mapigo ya moyo yanaweza kusababishwa na matumizi mengi ya vyakula vyenye mafuta au kukaanga, pombe, kahawa, vyakula vya viungo,
Chokoleti, au kuwa na chakula kingi ndani ya tumbo. Matunda ya machungwa au vyakula vyenye nyanya husababisha katika a
watu wachache.
Sababu zingine zinazochangia ni hernia ya hiatal, mzio, mafadhaiko, shida za gallbladder, na enzyme
Upungufu.

title: Reye'S Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• It would be well for the child to be given vitamin C (5-10 gms per day), intravenously;
vitamins B-complex and B , and selenium (250-500 mcg per day) intramuscularly.
12
• If, in the hospital, the child receives an IV solution of glucose and electrolytes (mineral
salts) within 12-24 hours after the heavy vomiting begins, his chances of recovery are very
good.
• Never give a child or youth aspirin after a fever. The pattern of events is this: The child
has a fever, and aspirin is given. There is improvement for a day or two,—then a sudden
turn for the worst occurs, and coma or death follows. A Centers for Disease Control
(CDC) study revealed that 96% of the children contracting Reye's syndrome had been
given aspirin while they had a viral infection. It was also found that there was a direct
correlation between the amount of aspirin given and the severity of the illness.
• In this emergency, if you have to give him a pain reliever, give him acetaminophen
(Tylenol, Datril, and others) or ibuprofen (Advil, Nuprin, and others) instead.
• Children's aspirins are banned in Britain because of this problem.
• The drug, Tigan, used in suppository form, to control vomiting and nausea, may also be
a cause of Reye's.
SYMPTOMS—A fever and vomiting suddenly occur. A rapid change in mental status to a deep
depression, nausea, amnesia; and then pneumonia, coma, convulsions, fixed and dilated pupils, and
death.
There can be confusion, drowsiness, memory lapses, lethargy, irritability or unusual belligerence.
There may be weakness or paralysis in the limbs, speech impairment, hearing loss, double vision, etc.
CAUSES—Reye's Syndrome is a disaster worth avoiding. This disease affects many internal organs,
especially the brain and liver.
It primarily strikes children between the ages of 4 and 15 (but most frequently young teens), in the fall
or winter.
Not long ago, the death rate stood at 42%-80%, but more recently it has dropped to below 10%.
Most cases occur after a viral infection, such as the flu or chickenpox. Influenza B, Epstein-Barr virus,
and viruses which primarily affect the gastrointestinal tract (enteroviruses) can also occur prior to its
onset.
It is known that giving aspirin to a child or youth who has a fever can lead to Reye's disease and the
likely possibility of death. In the early 1980s, it was discovered that a viral infection, plus the taking of
aspirin, dramatically increases the risk of developing Reye's syndrome.
The cause of the disease may be consumption of aflatoxin, which is an exotoxin of the grain mold,
aspergillus flavus.
A biopsy generally shows liver necrosis (the liver is dying). Yet, if the person survives, there is a full
recovery of the liver within 12 weeks.
If you see the above symptoms, just after your child has come out of a viral illness—do something
quickly! Here are the key symptoms again:
(1) Agitation, disorientation, and delirium.
(2) Fatigue, lethargy, and lapses in memory.
(3) Prolonged and heavy vomiting, followed by drowsiness.
Call a physician! Phone 911, and send the child to a hospital!
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Itakuwa vizuri kwa mtoto kupewa vitamini C (5-10 gms kwa siku), kwa ndani;
Vitamini B-Complex na B, na Selenium (250-500 mcg kwa siku) intramuscularly.
12
• Ikiwa, hospitalini, mtoto hupokea suluhisho la IV la sukari na elektroni (madini
Chumvi) Ndani ya masaa 12-24 baada ya kutapika nzito kuanza, nafasi zake za kupona ni sana
Nzuri.
• Kamwe usipe mtoto au vijana aspirini baada ya homa. Mfano wa matukio ni hii: mtoto
ina homa, na aspirini hupewa. Kuna uboreshaji kwa siku moja au mbili, - kisha ghafla
Pinduka kwa mbaya zaidi hufanyika, na kufahamu au kifo hufuata. Vituo vya kudhibiti magonjwa
(CDC) Utafiti umebaini kuwa 96% ya watoto wanaopata ugonjwa wa Reye walikuwa wamekuwa
Kwa kuzingatia aspirini wakati walikuwa na maambukizi ya virusi. Iligundulika pia kuwa kulikuwa na moja kwa moja
Kuhusiana kati ya kiasi cha aspirini iliyopewa na ukali wa ugonjwa.
• Katika dharura hii, ikiwa itabidi umpe maumivu, mpe acetaminophen
(Tylenol, Datril, na wengine) au ibuprofen (Advil, Nuprin, na wengine) badala yake.
• Aspirins za watoto zimepigwa marufuku Uingereza kwa sababu ya shida hii.
• Dawa, Tigan, inayotumika katika fomu ya kuongezea, kudhibiti kutapika na kichefuchefu, pia inaweza kuwa
sababu ya Reye.
Dalili -homa na kutapika hufanyika ghafla. Mabadiliko ya haraka katika hali ya akili kuwa ya kina
Unyogovu, kichefuchefu, amnesia; na kisha pneumonia, coma, consulsions, fasta na dilated wanafunzi, na
kifo.
Kunaweza kuwa na machafuko, usingizi, mapungufu ya kumbukumbu, uchovu, kuwashwa au ukali usio wa kawaida.
Kunaweza kuwa na udhaifu au kupooza katika miguu, uharibifu wa hotuba, upotezaji wa kusikia, maono mara mbili, nk.
Sababu - Dalili ya Reye ni janga linalofaa kuepusha. Ugonjwa huu unaathiri viungo vingi vya ndani,
Hasa ubongo na ini.
Inawavutia watoto kati ya miaka 4 na 15 (lakini vijana wachanga mara nyingi), katika msimu wa joto
au msimu wa baridi.
Sio muda mrefu uliopita, kiwango cha vifo kilisimama kwa 42%-80%, lakini hivi karibuni imeshuka hadi chini ya 10%.
Kesi nyingi hufanyika baada ya maambukizo ya virusi, kama vile homa au kuku. Mafua B, virusi vya Epstein-Barr,
na virusi ambavyo vinaathiri sana njia ya utumbo (enteroviruses) pia vinaweza kutokea kabla ya yake
mwanzo.
Inajulikana kuwa kutoa aspirini kwa mtoto au kijana ambaye ana homa inaweza kusababisha ugonjwa wa Reye na
uwezekano wa kifo. Katika miaka ya mapema ya 1980, iligundulika kuwa maambukizi ya virusi, pamoja na kuchukua
Aspirin, huongeza sana hatari ya kupata ugonjwa wa Reye.
Sababu ya ugonjwa inaweza kuwa matumizi ya aflatoxin, ambayo ni exotoxin ya ukungu wa nafaka,
Aspergillus flavus.
Biopsy kwa ujumla inaonyesha necrosis ya ini (ini inakufa). Walakini, ikiwa mtu huyo atapona, kuna kamili
Kupona kwa ini ndani ya wiki 12.
Ikiwa utaona dalili hapo juu, mara tu baada ya mtoto wako kutoka kwa ugonjwa wa virusi - fanya kitu
haraka! Hapa kuna dalili muhimu tena:
(1) Mchanganyiko, usumbufu, na delirium.
(2) Uchovu, uchovu, na kupungua kwa kumbukumbu.
(3) kutapika kwa muda mrefu na nzito, ikifuatiwa na usingizi.
Piga simu daktari! Simu 911, na umpeleke mtoto hospitalini!

title: Sorrow Of The Heart
contentEn:
• As far back as the second century A.D., the Greek physician Galen noted that melancholic women
were more likely than others to develop cancer.
• Today, the effect of emotions and stress (or rather the attitude toward stress) is recognized even more.
Over the past 75 years a number of studies have linked stress to susceptibility to cancer (R. Ader,
Psychoneuroimmunology, 1981). Strong stress in a child can also lead to it (B.L. Bloom, et. al.,
Psychological Bulletin 85 no. 4, 1978). Adults who who had recently lost a loved one, or were widowed,
divorced, or separated, have the highest cancer rates (B.L. Ernster, Journal of the National Cancer
Institute, 63, no. 3, 1979).
• Ronald Grossarth-Maticek, M.D., a European researcher, spent 20 years working along a line of study
which has been rejected by orthodox medicine. His concept is called Creative Novation Behavior
Therapy, and it concerns people with certain personalities; that is, having certain mental-emotional
attitudes, are the most likely to contract cancer.
• Grossarth-Maticek is a Yugoslavian oncologist (cancer specialist) who used mortality data in
Heidelberg, Germany.
• People who view life in a certain way are more prone to develop cancer.
• Type C persons are unable to solve problems in relationships with other persons, situations, and goals.
When relationships are crushed, circumstances go back, or goals become unachievable, these people
react by sinking into a depression, characterized as feelings of helplessness and hopelessness. Type C
people are highly prone to cancer.
• Type H persons also have the same difficulties named above, but they react quite different to such
problems. Instead of feeling hopeless and helpless, they become angry and frustrated. Type H people
tend to develop heart disease.
• Type F persons learn how to roll with the punches. They are free of fears and worries, for they give
them into God's hands to care for. Although they encounter problems as others do, they trust in God,
recognize their own limitations, and, when difficulties arise, keep moving forward cheerfully. This type
tends to die of other causes, such as accidents. They tend not to die of cancer or heart or circulatory
problems.
• These people are not living under stress, with aroused hormonal flow, such as type 1 and 2
personalities have. They are at peace with life. They accept what has to be, change whatever they can
change, and, with God's help, keep cheerfully on their way, helping others as they go.
• Still other researchers have found other aspects of this Type C (cancer-prone) personality.
The main aspect they have noted is loss, either loss of a loved one, or loss of hope. Many cancer patients
feel a profound sense of helplessness and despair, particularly about the meaning of their existence.
Frequently, they need peace with God.
• A second characteristic is the suppression or repression, of emotions.
• The third factor is loneliness. Such people tend not to have close friends. (H. Dreher, Your Defense
Against Cancer, 1988, 246-247.)
• All three factors could be nicely resolved if such individuals would come to God and find in Him the
encouragement, the forgiveness, and strength they need to meet life's difficulties.
contentSw:
• Hadi nyuma kama karne ya pili A.D., daktari wa Uigiriki Galen alibaini kuwa wanawake wa melanini
walikuwa na uwezekano mkubwa kuliko wengine kukuza saratani.
• Leo, athari za hisia na mafadhaiko (au tuseme mtazamo wa mafadhaiko) unatambulika zaidi.
Katika miaka 75 iliyopita masomo kadhaa yameunganisha mafadhaiko na uwezekano wa saratani (R. Ader,
Psychoneuroimmunology, 1981). Dhiki kali kwa mtoto pia inaweza kusababisha hiyo (B.L. Bloom, et. Al.,
Bulletin ya kisaikolojia 85 hapana. 4, 1978). Watu wazima ambao walikuwa wamepoteza mpendwa hivi karibuni, au walikuwa wajane,
talaka, au kutengwa, kuwa na viwango vya juu zaidi vya saratani (B.L. Ernster, Jarida la Saratani ya Kitaifa
Taasisi, 63, hapana. 3, 1979).
• Ronald Grossarth-Maticek, M.D., mtafiti wa Ulaya, alitumia miaka 20 kufanya kazi kwenye safu ya masomo
ambayo imekataliwa na dawa ya Orthodox. Wazo lake linaitwa tabia ya ubunifu wa novation
Tiba, na inahusu watu na haiba fulani; Hiyo ni, kuwa na kihemko fulani ya kiakili
Mitazamo, ndio uwezekano mkubwa wa kupata saratani.
• Grossarth-Maticek ni mtaalam wa oncologist wa Yugoslavia (mtaalam wa saratani) ambaye alitumia data ya vifo katika
Heidelberg, Ujerumani.
• Watu ambao huona maisha kwa njia fulani wanakabiliwa zaidi na saratani.
• Aina ya watu C hawawezi kutatua shida katika uhusiano na watu wengine, hali, na malengo.
Wakati uhusiano umekandamizwa, hali zinarudi nyuma, au malengo hayawezi kufikiwa, watu hawa
Kuguswa na kuzama kwa unyogovu, inayojulikana kama hisia za kutokuwa na msaada na kutokuwa na tumaini. Aina c
Watu wanakabiliwa na saratani.
• Aina ya watu pia wana shida kama hizo zilizotajwa hapo juu, lakini zinaguswa tofauti kabisa na vile
shida. Badala ya kuhisi kutokuwa na tumaini na kukosa msaada, wanakasirika na kufadhaika. Andika watu H.
huwa na kukuza magonjwa ya moyo.
• Aina F watu hujifunza jinsi ya kusonga na viboko. Wao hawana hofu na wasiwasi, kwa maana wanapeana
wao mikononi mwa Mungu kutunza. Ingawa wanakutana na shida kama wengine, wanamwamini Mungu,
Tambua mapungufu yao wenyewe, na, wakati shida zinaibuka, endelea kusonga mbele kwa furaha. Aina hii
huelekea kufa kwa sababu zingine, kama ajali. Huwa hawafa na saratani au moyo au mzunguko
shida.
• Watu hawa hawaishi chini ya mafadhaiko, na mtiririko wa homoni, kama aina ya 1 na 2
haiba ina. Wana amani na maisha. Wanakubali kile kinachohitajika kuwa, badilisha chochote wanachoweza
Badilisha, na, kwa msaada wa Mungu, endelea kwa furaha kwenye njia yao, kusaidia wengine wanapoenda.
• Bado watafiti wengine wamepata mambo mengine ya aina ya aina ya C (saratani-kukabiliana).
Jambo kuu ambalo wamebaini ni kupoteza, ama kupoteza mpendwa, au kupoteza tumaini. Wagonjwa wengi wa saratani
Jisikie hisia kubwa ya kutokuwa na msaada na kukata tamaa, haswa juu ya maana ya uwepo wao.
Mara kwa mara, wanahitaji amani na Mungu.
• Tabia ya pili ni kukandamiza au kukandamiza, ya hisia.
• Jambo la tatu ni upweke. Watu kama hao huwa hawana marafiki wa karibu. (H. Dreher, utetezi wako
Dhidi ya Saratani, 1988, 246-247.)
• Sababu zote tatu zinaweza kutatuliwa vizuri ikiwa watu kama hao wangekuja kwa Mungu na kupata ndani yake
kutia moyo, msamaha, na nguvu wanazohitaji kufikia shida za maisha.
